topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Beta: Viewing Image Details

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.

Based on whether you are working on a project or the domain:
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Volumes tab.
Click the Project dashboard, then the Compute panel, then the Volumes tab.
The available images are listed.

Click the name of the image.
When your cursor is on the image name, the name is underlined.

The Image Details screen shows detailed information about the image, including:
name and ID
status
creation and modification date(s)
size
formats
size
